question: The "Berounka River" is located in which country?
explanation: Berounka River is located in the Czech Republic. It is the biggest left tributary of Vltava River. It originates from the confluence of Mze and Radbuza Rivers in the Pilsen town of the Czech Republic and it joins the Vltava River in Prague. It flows along with the Krivoklatsko Protected Landscape Area.
